attributes.action: Provide Funding for Young people of Bridlington to undertake awareness and training in Bridlington
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Providing young people in Bridlington  funding for them to do after school clubs, and nvq studies.  Bridlington is a deprived area, with no facilities for young people in the town.  
Bellezza Academy is a social enteprise training facility which is providing young people after school training, to come and learn about the beauty industry, how to start up a business,  it provides NVQ for the nursing and beauty industry, as well as start up business advice and support. Bellezza is giving people of all ages opportunities to learn and get into employment with the correct qualifications, or self employment. There is no other provision for this type of centre in the town.
All we are trying to do is provide a facility that will encourage people to progress thier future, it will make them motivated, provide education, provide employment, get them of benefits. As a result it will provide the town with more qualified people, and encourage them to go onto further Education
